actions.text: Measure called up by unanimous consent in Senate.
Reported to Senate from the Committee on Government Operations, S. Rept. 94-748.

official_title: A resolution disapproving certain regulations proposed by the Administrator of General Services under section 104 of the Presidential Recordings and Materials Preservation Act.

summary.text: Provides that, pursuant to the provisions of the Presidential Recordings and Materials Preservation Act, the Senate hereby disapproves specified sections of the regulations proposed by the Administrator of General Services in his report to the Senate submitted on October 15, 1975.

titles.title: A resolution disapproving certain regulations proposed by the Administrator of General Services under section 104 of the Presidential Recordings and Materials Preservation Act.
